definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: rest (NH id.; Aram. [[נוּחַ]], noh.; Ph. [[נחת]] n. rest; poss. also vb. [[ינח]] (Iph. Pf.), cf. Levy cited CIS:i. 118 Lzb:322; As. nâhu, rest (inûh), and deriv.; Eth. nox: be extended, long, rarely rest; Ar. na0xa IV. is make camel lie down on his breast; muna0xun resting-place of camel, cf. Doughty:Arab. Des. i, 397, ii, 63, 486, 642);—

rest, settle down and remain, sq. [[עַל]]; of birds 2Sa 21:10; ark Ge 8:4 (P); [[נׇ֫חָה אֲרָם עַל־אֶפְרַיִם]] Is 7:2 Aram hath settled down upon Ephraim; of spirit of ´[[י]] Nu 11:25, Nu 11:26 (E), Is 11:2; spirit of Elijah 2Ki 2:15; sceptre of wicked Ps 125:3 (in fig.); sq. [[בְּ]] loc.: of insects Ex 10:14 (J), Is 7:19 (fig. of invaders); of soles of feet resting in water Jos 3:13 (JE); hand of ´[[י]] Is 25:10; wisdom Pr 14:33; anger Ec 7:9; [[בִּקְהַל רְפָאִים יׇנוּחַ]] Pr 21:16 in the assembly of Shades shall he settle down; abs., = stop, of ark at stages of journey Nu 10:36 (JE); cease speaking 1Sa 25:9.

repose, be quiet, have rest: after labour Ex 20:11 (E; of God), Ex 23:12 (E; of cattle), De 5:14 (of slave); have rest from ([[מִן]]) enemies Es 9:16 (inf. abs. [[נוֹחַ]], + [[עָמוֹד]], [[הָרוֹג]]), v:Es 9:22, cf. (abs.) v:Es 9:17, v:Es 9:18 (in both + [[עָשׂה]]), Ne 9:28; be at rest (from trouble), abs., Job 3:26 (+ [[שָׁלַוְתִּי]], [[שָׁקַטְתִּי]]); of the earth Is 14:7; in couch of the grave Is 57:2; in Shₑ’ôl Job 3:17, so prob. Da 12:13; also [[לאׁ תָּנוּחַ]] [[לָח]] Is 23:12 = thou shalt not be at rest, cf. impers. [[יׇנוּחַ לִי]] Job 3:13 = I should be at rest (in Shₑ’ôl).—[[אָנוּחַ לְיוֹם חָרָה]] Hb Hab 3:16 is dub.: I wait quietly for the day of distress De Ke Hi-St SS, so Now, doubtfully; We conj. [[אֶנׇּחֵם]] as Is 1:24 I will appease me, GASm leaves untransl.

definitions.title: Hiph. A.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[הֵנִיחַ]] Jos 22:4 +; 1 S. [[וַהֲנִיחׂ֫תִי]] 2Sa 7:11 +; [[הֵנִ֫יחוּ]] Zec 6:8; Impf. 3 ms. [[יׇנִיחַ]] Ex 17:11 +; [[וַיׇּ֫נַח]] Jos 21:42 +; sf. [[וַיְנִיחֵנִי]] Ez Eze 37:1, Eze 40:2; 3 fs. sf. [[תְּנִיחֶנּוּ]] Is 63:14 (but v. infr.), etc.; Imv. mpl. [[הָנִ֫יחוּ]] Is 28:12; Inf. cstr. [[הָנִיּחַ]] Is 14:3 +, sf. [[הֲנִיחִי]] Ez Eze 24:13; Pt. [[מֵנִיחַ]] Jos 1:13; —
cause to rest = give rest to:

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: sq. acc. [[יׇדוֹ]] Ex 17:11 (E), [[רוּחִי]] Zec 6:8; so appar. sq. [[חֲמָתִי]] + [[ב]] pers., quiet (i.e. sate) my fury by (wreak it upon) Ez Eze 5:13 (del. Co), Eze 16:42, Eze 24:13, also Eze 21:22 (Co adds [[ב]] pers.).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: usu. sq. [[ל]] pers.: (1) give rest to i.e. bring to resting-place Ex 33:14 (J), De 3:20, Jos 1:13, Jos 1:15, Jos 22:4 (all D), 1Ch 23:25; so, c. sf., Is 63:14 (si vera l.; Vrss Lo Ew Brd Che:Hpt rd. [[תַּנְחֶנּוּ]], leadeth him, √ [[נחה]]); (2) of freedom from enemies, Is 28:12, 2Ch 14:5; + [[מִכָּל־איבים]] [[[מִסָּבִיב]]] De 12:10, De 25:19, Jos 23:1 (D), 2Sa 7:1, 2Sa 7:11, 1Ch 22:9; so + [[מִסָּבִיב]] alone 1Ki 5:18, Jos 21:42 (P), 1Ch 22:18, 2Ch 14:6, 2Ch 15:15, 2Ch 20:30, so also prob. 2Ch 32:22 (for MT [[וַיְנַהֲלֵם מִסָּבִיב]]); (3) of freedom suffering, + ´[[מֵעָחְבְּ ְוגו]] Is 14:3.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: make quiet in mind, set at rest [[וִינִיחְֶָ]] Pr 29:17 discipline thy son, that he may give thee quiet (of mind; ‖[[יִתֵּן]] [[מַעֲדַנִּים לְנַפְשְֶָׁ]]).

cause to rest (i.e. light) upon, c. acc. staff + [[עַל]] pers. Is 30:32; c. acc. blessing + [[אֶל־]] Ez Eze 44:30; cause to alight, set down, c. sf. pers. + [[בְּתוֹח]] loc. Ez Eze 37:1; + [[אֶל־]] Eze 40:2; —For this mng. v. esp.

definitions.title: B.
definitions.body: infr.

definitions.title: B.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[הִנִּיחַ]] Ju Jdg 3:1 +, [[הִנִּחַ]] 1Ki 8:9, sf. [[וְהִנִּיחוֹ]] De 26:4, [[וְהִנִּיחָם]] Le 16:23 both consec.; 2 ms. [[וְהִנַּחְתָּ֫]] De 14:28, sf. [[וְהִנַּחְתּוֹ]] De 26:10 consec., etc.; Impf. 3 ms. [[יַנִּיחַ]] Le 7:15, [[וַיַּנַּח]] Ju Jdg 2:23 +, sf. [[וַיַּנִּיחֵהוּ]] Ex 16:34; 3 fs. [[וַתַּנַּח]] Ge 39:16; 2 ms. juss. [[אַל־תַּנַּח]] Ec 7:18 + 2 t., etc.; Imv. ms. [[הַנַּח]] Ho 4:7 + 2 t., [[הַנִּ֫יחָה]] Ex 32:10, Ju Jdg 16:26, etc.; Inf. cstr. sf. [[לְהַנִּיחוֹ]] Nu 32:15, [[לְהַנִּיחָם]] Es 3:8; Pt. [[מַנִּיחַ]] Ec 5:11; —

lay or set down, deposit, let lie, c. acc. rei, usu. + word of place: stones at ford of Jordan Jos 4:3, Jos 4:8 (JE), ark 1Sa 6:18, garments Ge 39:16 (J), Le 16:23 (P), Ez Eze 42:14, Eze 44:19; cf. Ex 16:23, Ex 16:24, Ex 16:33, Ex 16:34, Nu 17:4, Nu 17:7 (all P), De 26:4, De 26:10, 1Ki 8:9, 1Ki 13:31, Ez Eze 40:42, Eze 42:13; so, acc. om., Ju Jdg 6:18; Jdg 6:20 De 14:28, Nu 19:9 (P), 1Sa 10:25; place, put, sq. acc. pers. + local modif., Ge 2:15 (J), Ge 19:16 (J), Jos 6:23 (JE), Le 24:12, Nu 15:34 (both P), Is 14:1, Is 46:7, Ez Eze 37:14; prob. also Zec 5:11 (rd. [[וְהִנִּיחֻהָ]], v. Ges:§ 72 ee); rd. [[וַיַּנִּיחֵם]] also 2Ki 18:11 (LXX e)/qeto; for MT [[וַיַּנְחֵם]]; cf. [[וַיּשֶׁב אוֹתָם]] ‖ 2Ki 17:6); place corpse on ([[אֶל־]]) ass 1Ki 13:29, in grave v:1Ki 13:30; horsemen and chariots in cities 2Ch 1:14, 2Ch 9:25, so rd. also ‖ 1Ki 10:26 (LXX e)/qeto; for MT [[וַיַּנְחֵם]]); tables in temple 2Ch 4:8; idols in shrines 2Ki 17:29 (acc. om.). Here belongs perh. also [[וְגַם מִזֶּה אַל־תַּנַּח אֶת־יׇדְֶָ]] Ec 7:18 and also from this do not lest thy hand lie (idle), i.e. engage in it, cf. Ec 11:6; lay down forcibly, thrust down [[הִנִּיחַ לָאָרֶץ בְּיׇדָ]] Is 28:2, cf. Am 5:7; perh. also Ez Eze 22:20 (abs.; but del. Co Berthol, after LXX).

let remain, leave (in present condition), obj. nations Ju Jdg 2:23, Jdg 3:1, Je 27:11, people in wilderness Nu 32:15 (JE); [[וְהִנִּיחוּח עֵירׂם וְעֶרְיׇה]] Ez Eze 16:39; sq. acc. rei Le 7:15, 1Ki 7:47 (leave unweighed); leave behind sq. acc. pers. Ge 42:33 (E), 2Sa 16:21, 2Sa 20:3, 1Ki 19:3, Je 43:6; + [[אֶת־פְּנֵי]] 1Sa 22:4 (rd. [[וַיַּנִּחֵם]], for MT [[וַיַּנְחֵם]], and he left them with SyrVer Targum Vulgate We Dr Klo Bu Löhr HPS; leave name, for a curse Is 65:15; leave or bequeath to ([[ל]]), c. acc. rei, Ps 17:14, Ec 2:18.
leave = depart from, [[מְקוֹמְ ְאַל־תַּנַּח]] Ec 10:4 do not leave thy place.
abandon, sq. acc. pers. Je 14:9; [[בַּל־תַּנִּיחֵנִי]] [[לְעשְׁקַָי]] Ps 119:121 abandon me not to my oppressors.

let alone (refrain from interfering with), sq. [[ל]] pers. Ex 32:10 (JE; obj. ´[[י]]), Ho 4:17, 2Sa 16:11, 2Ki 23:18; sq. acc. pers. Es 3:6; = avoid [[יַנִּיחַ חֲטָאִים גְּדוֹלִים]] Ec 10:4 (but rd. perh. [[יׇנִיחַ]], causeth to rest = allayeth cf. Wild).
permit, c. acc. pers. Ju Jdg 16:26; + inf. [[לאׁ הִנִּיחַ אָדָם לְעָשְׁקָם]] Ps 105:14 = 1Ch 16:2l, but here [[הִנִּיחַ לְאִישׁ]], cf. [[מַנִּיחַ לוֹ לִישׁוֹן]] Ec 5:11.

definitions.title: Hoph. A.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[הוּנַּח־לָָנוּ]] La 5:5 i.e. no rest is granted to us; for 3 fs. [[וְהֻנִ֫יחָה]] Zec 5:11 [so Baer Ginsb; van d. H. ´[[והֻנּ]]] rd. prob. [[וְהִנִּיחֻהָ]] v. supr.

definitions.title: Hiph. B 1. B.
definitions.body: Pt. [[מֻנׇּ֔ח]] as subst. = space left, open space Ez Eze 41:9, Eze 41:11, Eze 41:11.
